title: PlayStation VR 2 Design Revealed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.22.22
description:
It's an Xcast takeover of Games Daily with Mike and Gary talking about LEGO sports games, the PSVR 2, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:05:06 - Lego Sports Games On The Way!
00:21:30 - Shadow Warrior 3 dropping DAY ONE on PS Now March 1
00:30:33 - Ads
00:32:41 - FIRST LOOK AT PSVR 2 Headset
00:52:28 - Out today
00:53:22 - “ I was playing a game of "memory management Tetris / gymnastics" trying to fit a new 120GB game onto my Series S…” - Nate Hoss
00:56:30 - Squad Up: Mike and Greg Playing The Witch Queen on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
00:57:12 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
